name: Warlord
proficiencies: Saving Throw: STR +9 | Saving Throw: DEX +7, CON +8 | Skill: Athletics +9 | Skill: Intimidation +8, Perception +5, Persuasion +8

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (3/Day).
special_abilities.desc: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Survivor.
special_abilities.desc: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow.
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
